app.name: Automated Healthcheck
app.short_description: Comprehensive health check and monitoring for your Zendesk instance
app.long_description:
Gravity CX is a Zendesk Advanced Partner, trusted by leading organizations across Australia and Asia Pacific to deliver exceptional customer experiences. With deep expertise in Zendesk implementation, optimization, and support.

Introducing the Gravity CX Healthcheck App - your automated solution for maintaining a high-performing Zendesk instance.

What is Healthcheck?

Healthcheck is a comprehensive monitoring solution that continuously analyzes your Zendesk configuration, providing real-time insights and actionable recommendations. It's like having a Zendesk expert constantly reviewing your instance to ensure optimal performance.

Key Benefits:

- Proactive Issue Detection: Identify potential problems before they impact your service

- Best Practice Alignment: Ensure your setup follows Zendesk recommended practices

- Configuration Monitoring: Track changes and maintain optimal settings

- Comprehensive Reports: Get detailed insights across tickets, users, organizations, macros, and triggers

- Performance Optimization: Improve response times and operational efficiency

What We Monitor:

- Ticket Workflows & SLAs

- User & Organization Settings

- Automation Rules & Triggers

- Custom Fields & Forms

- Security & Access Controls

- System Performance Metrics

Perfect for teams looking to maintain a healthy Zendesk environment while focusing on what matters most - delivering exceptional customer service.

For more information about Gravity CX and our services, visit https://gravitycx.com.au
app.installation_instructions:
1. Enter your Zendesk admin email address

2. Generate an API token by following these steps:

   - In Admin Center, click Apps and integrations in the sidebar

   - Select APIs > Zendesk API

   - Click the Add API token button

   - Copy the generated token immediately and store it securely (it won't be shown again)

   - (Optional) Add a description for your token

   - Click Save

3. Paste your API token in the API token field during the installation

4. Click install to complete setup

For more detailed instructions about API tokens, visit:
https://support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/4408889192858-Managing-access-to-the-Zendesk-API#topic_tcb_fk1_2yb
